GSD.description:
nilfs2: fix shift-out-of-bounds due to too large exponent of block size

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit ec93b5430ec0f60877a5388bb023d60624f9ab9f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: nilfs2: fix shift-out-of-bounds due to too large exponent of block size
